name: Boltzmann Brain
description: Boltzmann Brain is the hardcore 2D arcade puzzle game with local multiplayer about the Robot and his friends, who are found themselves conscious in a dark and also beautiful space. There's a lot of weird questions, but the main is - what is the reason to exist? In the end - harsh truth awaits.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Must support OpenGL 2.1 or higher. Intel HD 3000 or better. Storage: 1 GB available space
